Title: Nikola Jokic and the Nuggets prove to be too much for Trail Blazers
Description: Between Damian Lillard and Enes Kanter’s two-man game or Gary Trent Jr.’s three-point shot showing up in Denver, the Blazers started off strong. But so did Nikola Jokic and the Nuggets. Denver took a 34-25 lead at the end of the first quarter behind Jokic’s 11.
Author: NBC Sports
